meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>sink</kanji> down and <kanji>shut up</kanji>. You go into a <vocabulary>silence</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>hush</vocabulary>. This tends to be an awkward silence or hush.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
